Comments_List: I learned a lot both about my thesis topic and about how to manage my time to finish a thesis.

I really value the amount of structure that WGSS providesit's really helpful to have regular checkins and even more helpful to have regular deadlines. I think perhaps the deadlines could be better enforced because I know some of my classmates just didn't get things in.
